item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

23. New technique generates topological structures with gravity water waves (49 points | 8 comments)
24. On David Lynch's Revenge of the Jedi (2018) (226 points | 103 comments)
25. Are electric cars that much cheaper to operate? (15 points | 99 comments)

27. Visualize Ownership and Lifetimes in Rust (198 points | 51 comments)
28. Why can't we remember our lives as babies or toddlers? (189 points | 213 comments)
